item.title: Nvidia 财报中的细微差别引发巨大挫败感
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将探讨人们对英伟达（Nvidia）季度财报的浓厚兴趣。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King looks at the intense interest in Nvidia’s quarterly earnings report.】

item.title: 债券市场的 "脆弱性 "显示了将希望作为策略的危险性
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们关注的是国际货币基金组织关于政府债务的警告。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at an IMF warning on government debt. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 圭亚那大选对手希望国家从石油收入中获得更大份额
item.description:
反对党总统候选人承诺重新谈判埃克森公司的石油合同，以帮助缓解南美国家不断上升的通货膨胀。【原文：

Opposition presidential candidates are pledging to renegotiate Exxon’s oil contract to help alleviate rising inflation in the South American nation. 

】

item.title: 瑞银因担心关税冲击而下调瑞士 2026 年展望
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）下调了瑞士明年的经济增长预期，并预测只要美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）39%的关税仍然有效，瑞士经济就会受到持续影响。【原文：UBS Group AG cut its growth forecast for Switzerland next year and predicted a sustained impact on the economy as long as US President Donald Trump’s 39% tariff remains in force.】

item.title: 印度国内生产总值（GDP）数据强劲，减息预期受挫，印度债券下滑
item.description: 印度国内生产总值（GDP）数据强于预期，抑制了央行降息的预期，印度债券因此下滑。【原文：Indian bonds slumped as stronger-than-expected GDP data dampened expectations of central bank interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 亚当-斯密会如何看待特朗普的关税？
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，特别小组将讨论这位著名经济学家和哲学家对全球贸易现状的看法。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, a special panel discusses what the famous economist and philosopher might say about the current state of global trade. 

】

item.title: 据说百事公司将以 5.85 亿美元的交易增持 Celsius 股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，百事可乐公司正在增持 Celsius Holdings Inc.【原文：PepsiCo Inc. is increasing its stake in Celsius Holdings Inc. in a $585 million deal that will boost distribution of some of the energy-drink maker’s popular beverages, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Lululemon 创始人出售 1.6 亿美元 Amer Sports 股票
item.description: Lululemon Athletica Inc. 创始人 Chip Wilson 出售了价值 1.597 亿美元的 Amer Sports Inc.【原文：Lululemon Athletica Inc. founder Chip Wilson sold $159.7 million worth of stock in Amer Sports Inc., his latest move to monetize his equity holdings.】

item.title: Permira 向企业服务公司 JTC 提出收购请求
item.description: Permira 表示正在探索收购在伦敦上市的基金解决方案和企业服务提供商 JTC Plc。【原文：Permira said it’s exploring an acquisition of JTC Plc, the London-listed provider of fund solutions and corporate services.】

item.title: 铜矿繁荣助推赞比亚股价傲视全球
item.description: 赞比亚的主要股票指数是 8 月份全球涨幅最大的股票指数，当月上涨了 14.3%，因为该国从铜矿繁荣中获利颇丰。【原文：Zambia’s main stock index is the top gainer globally in August, advancing 14.3% in the month as the nation cashes in on a copper boom.】

item.title: 在人工智能和全球扩张之后，马云支持的蚂蚁金服利润锐减 60
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团公司的季度利润下降了 60%，此前这家中国数字支付巨头在海外取得了更多进展，并投资人工智能以增加收入。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s quarterly profit fell 60%, after the Chinese digital payments giant made more inroads overseas and invested in artificial intelligence to grow its revenue.】

item.title: 英国债券收益率高企吸引买家，尽管末日论者甚嚣尘上
item.description: 尽管英国的预算前景黯淡，但英国政府债券仍是一些大牌投资者（包括 Nedgroup Investments、Jupiter Asset Management 和 Mediolanum International Funds）的最爱。【原文：UK government bonds are still a favorite pick for some big-name investors including Nedgroup Investments, Jupiter Asset Management and Mediolanum International Funds, despite the nation’s gloomy budget outlook.】

item.title: 美联储风险令债券市场通胀指标触及六个月高点
item.description: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对美联储的抨击愈演愈烈，但本周美国国债市场仍保持相对平静，但通胀预期的进一步上升表明投资者对总统塑造央行的努力日益感到焦虑。【原文：The US Treasury market stayed relatively calm this week despite Donald Trump’s mounting attacks on the Federal Reserve, but a further rise in inflation expectations is one sign of growing investor angst over the president’s effort to shape the central bank.】

item.title: 彼得罗的头号掮客认为国会将对哥伦比亚富人增税
item.description: 据政府最高权力经纪人透露，哥伦比亚立法者将在大选前采取非常规的加税措施，因为只有富裕选民会受到影响。【原文：Colombian lawmakers will take the unconventional step of raising taxes right before an election since only wealthy voters will be affected, according to the government’s top power broker.】

item.title: 经济学家认为美国经济增长缓慢，通胀顽疾将持续到 2026 年
item.description: 经济学家预计，今年下半年乃至 2026 年，美国经济增长乏善可陈，由关税驱动的稳定通胀将对消费者造成冲击。【原文：Economists anticipate ho-hum US economic growth for the remainder of the year and well into 2026, with steady, tariff-driven inflation buffeting consumers.】

item.title: 快报》称毛里求斯总理解雇中央银行副行长
item.description: 据当地一家新闻网站报道，毛里求斯总理纳文钱德拉-拉姆古兰（Navinchandra Ramgoolam）解雇了中央银行的一名副行长，此前数周货币管理局的掌舵人关系紧张。【原文：Mauritian Prime Minister Navinchandra Ramgoolam fired a deputy governor at the central bank, a local news website reported, following weeks of tension at the helm of the monetary authority.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴人工智能收入攀升，但中国食品战影响利润
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）报告称，中国人工智能热潮带来的收入激增，帮助抵消了因与美团和 JD.com Inc. 在互联网商务领域的争斗加剧而出现的利润意外下滑。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. reported a surge in revenue from China’s AI boom, helping offset a surprise drop in profit tied to a worsening battle with Meituan and JD.com Inc. in internet commerce.】

item.title: 腾讯支持的乌兹别克金融科技独角兽 Uzum 着眼于欧洲债券和首次公开募股
item.description: 随着当地企业越来越多地向国际市场寻求资金，乌兹别克斯坦最有价值的初创企业--金融技术和电子商务公司乌祖姆（Uzum）--正在考虑如何尽快在明年筹集更多资金。【原文：Uzbekistan’s most valuable startup, the fintech and e-commerce company Uzum, is considering ways to raise more funds as soon as next year, as local businesses increasingly look to international markets for capital.】

item.title: 降息、特朗普与美联储之争，美元将在八月后走弱
item.description: 由于投资者为经济疲软和降息做准备，美元在 8 月份创下今年以来的最佳表现后出现回落。【原文：The dollar retreated in August after posting its best month this year as investors prepare for a weaker economy and interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 股票牛市为九月的季节性动荡做好准备
item.description: 有迹象表明，股票牛市正在向不可持续的水平推进，对此忧心忡忡的投资者很快就会有另一种担心。【原文：Investors fretting over signs the bull market in stocks is pushing toward unsustainable levels will soon have another thing to worry about.】

item.title: Amundi 看好大跌后法国债券和股票的抄底买盘
item.description: Amundi SA首席投资官Vincent Mortier表示，在法国总理弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）出人意料地要求进行信任投票后，法国债券收益率飙升，在此情况下，逢低买盘正在重返法国债券市场。【原文：Dip buyers are returning to French bonds after yields surged following a surprise call for a confidence vote by Prime Minister Francois Bayrou, Amundi SA Chief Investment Officer Vincent Mortier said.】

item.title: 穆里尼奥离开费内巴切对投资者而言价值 2,600 万美元
item.description: 通常情况下，解雇知名主教练是一个坏兆头。但对费内巴切的投资者来说却不是这样，这家土耳其足球俱乐部周五解雇穆里尼奥后，其股价大涨。【原文：Usually, the sacking of a renowned head coach is a bad sign. Not for investors in Fenerbahce, whose shares jumped after the Turkish football club sacked Jose Mourinho on Friday.】

item.title: 穆克什-安巴尼寻求在 2026 年 6 月前将 Reliance Jio 上市
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的目标是在 2026 年上半年将印度最大的无线运营商上市，因为信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）希望释放股东价值，并为投资者提供退出途径。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani is aiming to take India’s largest wireless carrier public by the first-half of 2026, as Reliance Industries Ltd. looks to unlock shareholder value and provide an exit route for investors.】

item.title: DeepSeek 助力中国科技冠军华为恢复盈利
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. posted a first-half profit, getting back into the black after the emergence of DeepSeek ignited a wave of AI development across China.】

item.title: 中国最大银行因减值增加而利润下降
item.description: 中国最大的银行--中国工商银行股份有限公司（Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd.）上半年利润下降，原因是利润率持续下降，贷款损失不断增加。【原文：Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd., China’s largest bank, posted a decline in profits in the first half of the year as it contends with a persistent drop in margins and rising loan losses.】

item.title: 花旗集团证券公司和 Tower 公司对印度交易所进行罕见投资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的 Citadel Securities LLC 和高频交易巨头 Tower Research 正在参股印度国家商品及衍生品交易所有限公司（National Commodity & Derivatives Exchange Ltd.），这标志着全球做市商首次在印度进行此类投资。【原文：Billionaire Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities LLC and high-frequency trading giant Tower Research are taking minority stakes in India’s National Commodity & Derivatives Exchange Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, marking the first such investment in the country by global market makers.】

item.title: 腾讯合作伙伴 PlaysOut 被指有意投资价值 1.5 亿美元的基金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，游戏技术初创公司 PlaysOut 正在考虑以超过 1.5 亿美元的估值筹集多达 1500 万美元的新股权融资。【原文：Gaming technology startup PlaysOut is considering raising as much as $15 million in new equity financing at a valuation topping $150 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 福特可能削减南非两家工厂约 9% 的工作岗位
item.description: 福特汽车公司计划在南非的两家工厂裁员 470 多人，而此时来自印度和中国的汽车进口量正在猛增。【原文：Ford Motor Co. plans to cut more than 470 jobs at two plants in South Africa, just as imports of cars from India and China jump.】

item.title: 长江和记考虑电讯业务选项，包括在香港上市
item.description: 亿万富翁李嘉诚控制的长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）正在考虑各种方案，其中包括其全球电信业务在香港上市的可能性。【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. is considering options including a potential Hong Kong listing of its global telecom business, people familiar with the matter said, as the conglomerate controlled by billionaire Li Ka-shing reviews its global empire of assets.】
